block_description: One you block someone, that person can no longer see things you post on your timeline, tag you, invite you to events or groups, start a conversation with you, or add you as a friend. Note: Does not include apps, games or groups you both participate in.
sms_description: Set up your account to receive authentication codes via SMS.
phone_description: Set up your account to receive authentication codes via phone calls.
backup_codes_description: Backup codes to use if you loss access to your authentication device. Keep these stored in a safe location.

viewing_sharing.allow_share: Allow others to share your posts to their Timeline?
